languages.text: {n}По команде хозяина Глейто направляет сеть скан-лучей на чудом уцелевшую ладонь растерзанного на клочки трупа. Аугмент кибермастифа издает тревожный сигнал.{/n}
languages.translation_comment: анимация: Глейто подходит к трупу, сканирует (как в куе_0002) + видимо, нужно скопировать экшн "саунд 2D", это ведь саунд сканирования?
анимация: Глейто подходит к трупу, сканирует (как в куе_0002) + видимо, нужно скопировать экшн "саунд 2D", это ведь саунд сканирования?

languages.text: {n}At his master's command, Glaito directs his scan rays at the dead man's severed hand, which has somehow avoided being reduced to shreds along with the rest of the body. The cyber-mastiff's augmetics emit a warning signal.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}По команде хозяина Глейто направляет сеть скан-лучей на чудом уцелевшую ладонь растерзанного на клочки трупа. Аугмент кибермастифа издает тревожный сигнал.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}At his master's command, Glaito directs his scan rays at the dead man's severed hand, which has somehow avoided being reduced to shreds along with the rest of the body. The cyber-mastiff's augmetics emit a warning signal.{/n}

{n}At his master's command, Glaito directs his scan rays at the dead man's severed hand, which has somehow avoided being reduced to shreds along with the rest of the body. The cyber-mastiff's augmetics emit a warning signal.{/n}

languages.text: {n}主人の命令に従い、グライトは死者の切断された手にスキャン光線を向けた。その手は他の遺体と共に粉砕される運命を何とか免れている。サイバーマスチフのオーグメティックが警告信号を発した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At his master's command, Glaito directs his scan rays at the dead man's severed hand, which has somehow avoided being reduced to shreds along with the rest of the body. The cyber-mastiff's augmetics emit a warning signal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}主人の命令に従い、グライトは死者の切断された手にスキャン光線を向けた。その手は他の遺体と共に粉砕される運命を何とか免れている。サイバーマスチフのオーグメティックが警告信号を発した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Auf Befehl seines Herren richtet Glaito seine Scanstrahlen auf die abgetrennte Hand des Toten, die aus irgendeinem Grund nicht wie der Rest der Leiche völlig zerfetzt wurde. Die Augmentationen des Cyber-Mastiffs geben ein Warnsignal ab.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At his master's command, Glaito directs his scan rays at the dead man's severed hand, which has somehow avoided being reduced to shreds along with the rest of the body. The cyber-mastiff's augmetics emit a warning signal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Auf Befehl seines Herren richtet Glaito seine Scanstrahlen auf die abgetrennte Hand des Toten, die aus irgendeinem Grund nicht wie der Rest der Leiche völlig zerfetzt wurde. Die Augmentationen des Cyber-Mastiffs geben ein Warnsignal ab.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Por orden de su amo, Glaito dirige sus rayos de escaneo a la mano cercenada del muerto, que ha logrado evitar ser despedazada con el resto del cadáver. Los auméticos del cibermastín emiten una señal de alerta.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At his master's command, Glaito directs his scan rays at the dead man's severed hand, which has somehow avoided being reduced to shreds along with the rest of the body. The cyber-mastiff's augmetics emit a warning signal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Por orden de su amo, Glaito dirige sus rayos de escaneo a la mano cercenada del muerto, que ha logrado evitar ser despedazada con el resto del cadáver. Los auméticos del cibermastín emiten una señal de alerta.{/n}

languages.text: {n}在索罗蒙的命令下，格雷托将扫描射线对准了罗尔多被扯掉的手。这只手奇迹般地保存了下来，没和身体的其他部分一起被撕成碎片。随后，生化獒犬的植入物发出了警告信号。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At his master's command, Glaito directs his scan rays at the dead man's severed hand, which has somehow avoided being reduced to shreds along with the rest of the body. The cyber-mastiff's augmetics emit a warning signal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}在索罗蒙的命令下，格雷托将扫描射线对准了罗尔多被扯掉的手。这只手奇迹般地保存了下来，没和身体的其他部分一起被撕成碎片。随后，生化獒犬的植入物发出了警告信号。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Glaito; efendisinin emriyle birlikte tarama ışınlarını, adamın nasıl olduysa vücudunun kalanıyla birlikte parçalanmaktan kurtulmuş kopuk eline yöneltiyor. Siber mastifin ogmetik sistemlerinden bir uyarı sinyali geliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At his master's command, Glaito directs his scan rays at the dead man's severed hand, which has somehow avoided being reduced to shreds along with the rest of the body. The cyber-mastiff's augmetics emit a warning signal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito, efendisinin emriyle birlikte tarama ışınlarını, adamın nasıl olduysa vücudunun kalanıyla birlikte parçalanmaktan kurtulmuş kopuk eline yöneltir. Siber mastifin ogmetik sistemlerinden bir uyarı sinyali gelir.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sur l'ordre de son maître, Glaito braque ses rayons sur la main coupée du mort qui a miraculeusement échappé au déchiquetage du reste du corps. Les augmétiques du cyber-mastiff émettent un signal d'alerte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At his master's command, Glaito directs his scan rays at the dead man's severed hand, which has somehow avoided being reduced to shreds along with the rest of the body. The cyber-mastiff's augmetics emit a warning signal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sur l'ordre de son maître, Glaito braque ses rayons sur la main coupée du mort qui a miraculeusement échappé au déchiquetage du reste du corps. Les augmétiques du cyber-mastiff émettent un signal d'alerte.{/n}
